description: Kazama Kenji likes to believe he is something of a delinquent. Moreover, others seem to like to agree that he is. Of course, Kenji's gang finds their way to a group of four not-so-normal girls—Chitose, Sakura, Minami and Roka—and all at once, whatever reputation he may have is nothing compared to the outrageous behavior of the girls. Shanghaied into joining their club, what will happen to his everyday life from that point on?

title.romaji: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!
title.english: KONOSUBA -God's blessing on this wonderful world!
Baka and Test - Summon the Beasts

title.romaji: Ore no Nounai Sentakushi ga, Gakuen Love Comedy wo Zenryoku de Jama Shiteiru
title.english: My Mental Choices Are Completely Interfering With My School Romantic Comedy
The Disastrous Life of Saiki K.

title.romaji: Inou-Battle wa Nichijou-kei no Naka de
Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu Ni!
title.english: Baka and Test - Summon the Beasts 2
Chronicles of the Going Home Club
The Kawai Complex Guide to Manors and Hostel Behavior
Daily Lives of High School Boys
